text: Good morning,  I hope someone here can help.  I have a current site running on HubSpot that I would like to update the look and feel of with new layout and maybe a new template.  What is the easiest way to do this?  Also I'm attempting to align a HubSpot built site with a site that is built in Wordpress - which is a bit tricky.  I particularly need a HubSpot Hero Module which has header text to the left and image to the right.  any ideas?  Thank you in advance.
my current site is <https://www.hydra.cloud/> and the site that I am trying to align the look and feel to is  <http://hydra.giraffeideas.com/>  Thanks in advance for your help.
Good morning <@UJZ5590GG> just sent you a DM
